properties.name: docId
properties.description: ID of the doc. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: tableId
properties.description: The table to create the row in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the API will not attempt to parse the data in any way

properties.name: keyColumns
properties.description: Optional column IDs, URLs, or names (fragile and discouraged), specifying columns to be used as upsert keys. If more than one separate by a comma (,).

properties.name: rowId
properties.description: ID or name of the row. Names are discouraged because they're easily prone to being changed by users. If you're using a name, be sure to URI-encode it. If there are multiple rows with the same value in the identifying column, an arbitrary one will be selected

properties.name: useColumnNames
properties.description: Whether to use column names instead of column IDs in the returned output. This is generally discouraged as it is fragile. If columns are renamed, code using original names may throw errors.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: rawData
properties.description: Whether to return the data exactly in the way it got received from the API

properties.name: visibleOnly
properties.description: Whether to return only visible rows and columns for the table

properties.name: columnId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create/Insert a row

properties.name: Delete Row
properties.description: Delete one or multiple rows

properties.name: Get All Columns
properties.description: Get all columns in a table

properties.name: Get All Rows
properties.description: Get all rows in a table

properties.name: Get Column
properties.description: Get a column

properties.name: Get Row
properties.description: Get a row

properties.name: Push Button
properties.description: Pushes a button

properties.name: formulaId
properties.description: The formula to get the row from

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many formulas

properties.name: controlId
properties.description: The control to get the row from

properties.name: viewId
properties.description: The view to get the row from

properties.name: keyName
properties.description: The view to get the row from

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get a view

properties.name: Get Columns
properties.description: Get all views columns

properties.name: Get Rows
properties.description: Get all views rows

properties.name: resource
properties.description: Controls provide a user-friendly way to input a value that can affect other parts of the doc

properties.name: Formula
properties.description: Formulas can be great for performing one-off computations

properties.name: Table
properties.description: Access data of tables in documents

properties.name: View
properties.description: Access data of views in documents
